text: This course presents a range of perspectives about the future of crypto.
There's no wild-eyed optimism and there's no gloomy pessimism.
There is instead an opportunity to grapple with
the very real challenges that crypto is going to present.
These challenges are gonna be technological.
They're gonna be related to governance mechanisms.
The best way to understand the future of crypto is to look at it realistically,
not to take an overly optimistic view,
not to take an overly pessimistic view,
but to grapple with the real-world challenges that confront us all.
